      Methods in tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.connection with parameters of type ConnectionListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Connection.addListener(ConnectionListener listener)
      Adds a listener, which will be notified of any changes to the connection.
      void Connection.removeListener(ConnectionListener listener)
      Removes a listener, which will no longer be notified of changes to the connection
